SNEWS_PT.test.snews_pt_test_suite¶

Taken from snewpy

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

snews_pt_test_suite()

Returns unittest.TestSuite of desiutil tests.

runtests()

Run all tests in snewpy.test.test_*.
SNEWS_PT.test.snews_pt_test_suite.snews_pt_test_suite()[source]¶
Returns unittest.TestSuite of desiutil tests.

This is factored out separately from runtests() so that it can be used by

python setup.py test.

SNEWS_PT.test.snews_pt_test_suite.runtests()[source]¶

Run all tests in snewpy.test.test_*.
